attributes.action: Set up more refuge homes for men that have been through rape or domestic abuse.
attributes.additional_details:
Men can be reluctant to say that they are victims, and they worry that they won't be believed," 
"What I'd say to these men is: there's more help out there than you think. The key is to talk to someone."
attributes.background:
This can happen to anyone, I think men should start having more support, advice and help if they have been through any neglect such as rape and domestic abuse.
According to data from the Crime Survey for England and Wales, at least 4% of men aged 16-59 experienced domestic abuse in 2014/15

rejection.details:
The provision of services to victims of domestic violence is a matter for local authorities. 

Your petition is very similar to an existing petition on the subject: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127610
